actions.message: Check with local authorities to verify the disaster and obtain additional information.
confirm about the type of incident, location, number and type of casualties to decide on activating the disaster phase.
Do you want to confirm activation of code yellow ?
Ask for help from local police and volunteer organizations as deemed necessary.
Organize debriefing
Ensure documentation
Update Highest Authority of the hospital about magnitude of incident on time to time basis
Report to Incident Command Officer
Mobilize the nursing staff to the triage and treatment area
Identifying nursing needs
Arrange for extra nursing and nurse aid staff
Report to Command Centre
Update the Incident command officer regarding stock of medication available according to the disasters.
Contact drug suppliers who can provide emergency supplies quickly.
have a runner to deliver required medications to respective areas
Establish the triage area.
Keep the emergency physicians on duty and call for back up emergency physicians
Call the paediatric 1st on call to cover the paediatric section
Call Surgical and Orthopaedics 1st and 2nd on call
Call Medical 2nd on call and Anaesthesia 1st on call
Call Obstetrics and Gynaecology 2nd on call
Report to command centre
Regulate entry and exit of personnel to ensure smooth functioning of the emergency services.
Ensure ambulance and other emergency services vehicles exit and entry freely.
Ask for local police arrangements, if required. Call 100
Divert media to Executive Lounge.
Divert attenders to Main Lobby area
